#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define i64 long long
#define pb push_back

int dp[100005];
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		//memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		int m;
		cin >> m;
		
		
		int len = s.length();
		dp[0] = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < len ; i++)
			dp[i+1] = dp[i] + (s[i] == 'A');
		
		int ans = 10000005;
		for(int i = m; i<= len;i++){
			ans = min(ans,m-((dp[i] - dp[i-m])));
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
